p: Alcoholic sugars, like mannitol and trehalose, are some carbohydrates components present in mushrooms ( Jain and Roy, 2009). Regarding fats, mushrooms are rich in polyunsaturated, monoinsaturated and saturated fatty acids, as palmitic, oleic, and linoleic acids ( Kavishree et al., 2008; Muszyńska et al., 2018).
